source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM DNACUSTOM.VW_DIGITALBANKING_ACCTBAL
WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(DATELASTMAINT, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN
    TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
    AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - INTERVAL '30' MINUTE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS');

source.sqlReaderQuery:
TRUNCATE TABLE DIGITALBANKING_ACCTBAL_Staging;
select count(*) from DIGITALBANKING_ACCTBAL_Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM DNACUSTOM.VW_DIGITALBANKING_ACCTLOCKOUT
WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(DATELASTMAINT, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN
    TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
    AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - INTERVAL '1' HOUR, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
    AND (InActiveDate IS NULL OR InActiveDate >= SYSDATE);

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM DNACUSTOM.VW_DIGITALBANKING_ORGPERSROLE
WHERE TO_DATE(DATELASTMAINT, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN
    TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
    AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - INTERVAL '1' DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS');

SELECT *
FROM DNACUSTOM.VW_DIGITALBANKINGTRANSACTIONS
WHERE TransactionFiscalDate >= TO_TIMESTAMP('@{variables('StartDate')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"')
AND TransactionFiscalDate <= TO_TIMESTAMP('@{variables('EndDate')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"')

activities.name: Fetch the date
activities.description: Fetch the date before 18 months ago

source.oracleReaderQuery: select  TRUNC(SYSDATE - 2) - INTERVAL '18' MONTH AS FIRSTTRANSDATE FROM DUAL
